name: Okpella Development Association – USA

headquarters.note: Principal office address matches current President's address

mission: ODA–USA focuses on projects beneficial to the entire Okpella community by collaborating with public/private partners to provide social and economic amenities and support investments that spur economic development and transform Okpella into a modern, vibrant town.
objectives: Promote unity, peace, and harmony among Okpella indigenes in the USA and Canada
Support socio-economic development of Okpella and host communities
Advance education, youth development, and scholarship programs
Preserve and promote Okpella cultural heritage, traditions, and values
Engage investors with focus on fairness, environmental sustainability, and social/economic impact
Foster welfare assistance and community support programs
Maintain transparency and accountability in all operations
audience: Okpella sons and daughters in USA and Canada
